Career Profile

Senior software engineer in test and book author with over 5 years of experience in designing and executing advanced manual and automation testing for complex software. Expert-level skills in developing automation test frameworks using cucumber Java, ruby, Appium and selenium for Android, IOS, API and WEB. Hands on build CI/CD infrastructure & reporting using Jenkins, Gitlab CI, GCP (google cloud platform), Grafana, and InfluxDB.

Senior Software Development Engineer in Test

2016 - 2019
Bukalapak.com, Jakarta

Key member of Quality Assurance core team as well as Discovery to Buy, CHAT, Personalization, Recommendation, E-Money, and Shopping Growth teams.

Tasks Performed:

  • Designed and executed complex automation tests for API, web, mobile, Android, and iOS apps.
  • Contributed to team effectiveness and efficiency through education of new SDET members, supporting and setting an example of best software development practices.
  • Partnered with developers and test engineers to improve and automate test and release processes.
  • Created new guidelines for quality assurance, BDD test standards, and automation script standards.
  • Produced, executed, and analyzed API and web performance using JMeter and Grafana.

Achievements:

  • Recognized as the youngest SDET promoted to Senior SDET and Core QA team.
  • Reduced execution time of automation tests by up to 40% through parallel execution, strategic improvements, headless browsers, and code refactoring. Implemented database automation testing.
  • Significantly reduced bugs, downtime frequency, and deployment time to production.
  • Reduced automation test false positives up to 50% through improvements to automation reports and standards, as well as refactoring previous framework.
